summary: This file contains dispatches and FBI documents related to Semen Spiridon Pohorilyj and Jozef Kozak. The documents discuss investigations into their activities, contacts, and potential connections with Soviet intelligence.
title: REDWOOD/LCIMPROVE: Semen Spiridon POHORILYJ and Jozef KOZAK Investigations
recipient: Director, Federal Bureau of Investigation; Chief, SR; Chief, WE; Chief, EE
sender: Chief of Station, Paris/Vienna; Deputy Director (Plans)
